citations.narrative:
The registrant failed to notify the AC Regional Director of a change in the address, and other changes in operations which
affected its status as a research facility. On July 6th from 3:40 – 4:10 pm, the inspector arrived at the listed address to
discover no research facility at the address provided, no regulated activity being performed from this address, and no
representative at this location. A phone call to the listed number was not answered or returned, but a response to an
email sent to the registrant was received. The registrant informed us that a series of unfortunate events beginning in
October of 2022, caused him to change locations and temporarily suspend business.
Timely and accurate notification of changes in operation are critical to ensure proper regulatory oversight of all registered
research facilities.
A research facility shall notify the AC Regional Director by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or
ownership, or other change in operations affecting its status as a research facility, within 10 days after making such
change. To be corrected by October 7, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with no adult present.
n

narrative:
2.30(c) 
   
Registration. 
The registrant failed to notify the AC Regional Director of a change in the address, and other changes in operations which 
affected its status as a research facility. On July 6th from 3:40 – 4:10 pm, the inspector arrived at the listed address to 
discover no research facility at the address provided, no regulated activity being performed from this address, and no 
representative at this location. A phone call to the listed number was not answered or returned, but a response to an 
email sent to the registrant was received. The registrant informed us that a series of unfortunate events beginning in 
October of 2022, caused him to change locations and temporarily suspend business. 
 
Timely and accurate notification of changes in operation are critical to ensure proper regulatory oversight of all registered 
research facilities. 
 
A research facility shall notify the AC Regional Director by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or 
ownership, or other change in operations affecting its status as a research facility, within 10 days after making such 
change. To be corrected by October 7, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with no adult present.
